benawad /

ory /

      keto---Open Source (Go) implementation of "Zanzibar: Google's Consistent, Global Authorization System". Ships gRPC, REST APIs, newSQL, and an easy and granular permission language. Supports ACL, RBAC, and other access models.

apache /

      superset---Apache Superset is a Data Visualization and Data Exploration Platform

input-output-hk /

      plutus-pioneer-program---

Unity-Technologies /

      com.unity.multiplayer.samples.coop---A small-scale cooperative game sample built on the new, Unity networking framework to teach developers about creating a similar multiplayer game.

bevyengine /

      bevy---A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

apache /

      incubator-dolphinscheduler---Apache DolphinScheduler is a distributed and extensible workflow scheduler platform with powerful DAG visual interfaces, dedicated to solving complex job dependencies in the data pipeline and providing various types of jobs available `out of the box`.

flutter /

      flutter---Flutter makes it easy and fast to build beautiful apps for mobile and beyond.

microsoft /

      CyberBattleSim---An experimentation and research platform to investigate the interaction of automated agents in an abstract simulated network environments.

Layout-Parser /

      layout-parser---A Python Library for Document Layout Understanding

androidmalware /

      android_hid---Use Android as Rubber Ducky against another Android device

sebastianbergmann /

      phpunit---The PHP Unit Testing framework.

edeng23 /

      binance-trade-bot---Automated cryptocurrency trading bot

adonovan /

      spaghetti---Spaghetti: a dependency analysis tool for Go packages

zhangdaiscott /

      JimuReport---一款免费的数据可视化工具，报表与大屏设计！类似于excel操作风格，在线拖拽完成报表设计！功能涵盖: 报表设计、图形报表、打印设计、大屏设计等，永久免费！

pretzelhammer /

      rust-blog---Educational blog posts for Rust beginners

urbanadventurer /

      Android-PIN-Bruteforce---Unlock an Android phone (or device) by bruteforcing the lockscreen PIN. Turn your Kali Nethunter phone into a bruteforce PIN cracker for Android devices! (no root, no adb)

streamich /

      react-use---React Hooks — 👍

martin-ger /

      esp_wifi_repeater---A full functional WiFi Repeater (correctly: a WiFi NAT Router)

sivel /

      speedtest-cli---Command line interface for testing internet bandwidth using speedtest.net

lydiahallie /

      javascript-questions---A long list of (advanced) JavaScript questions, and their explanations ✨

bridgecrewio /

      checkov---Prevent cloud misconfigurations during build-time for Terraform, Cloudformation, Kubernetes, Serverless framework and other infrastructure-as-code-languages with Checkov by Bridgecrew.

elixir-nx /

      axon---Nx-powered Neural Networks.

bilibili /

      ijkplayer---Android/iOS video player based on FFmpeg n3.4, with MediaCodec, VideoToolbox support.

cypress-io /

      cypress---Fast, easy and reliable testing for anything that runs in a browser.
